禍不單行.definition: misfortune does not come singly (idiom); it never rains but it pours

禍亂.definition: calamity and chaos; devastating disorder; great turmoil

禍國殃民.definition: to damage the country and cause suffering to the people (idiom)

禍害.definition: disaster; harm; scourge; bad person; to damage; to harm; to wreck

禍從口出.definition: Trouble issues from the mouth (idiom). A loose tongue may cause a lot of trouble.

禍根.definition: root of the trouble; cause of the ruin

禍福吉凶.definition: fate; portent; luck or disasters as foretold in the stars (astrology)

禍福無常.definition: disaster and happiness do not follow rules (idiom); future blessings and misfortunes are unpredictable

禍福與共.definition: to stick together through thick and thin (idiom)

禍首罪魁.definition: see 罪魁禍首|罪魁祸首[zui4kui2-huo4shou3]
